name: tm84
effect: Teaches Poison Jab to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Poison Jab to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The foe is stabbed with a tentacle or
arm seeped with poison. It may also
poison the foe.

flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user attacks by striking the target with its hard
tail. It hits the target two to five times in a row.
